title: The End Is The Beginning | Yahtzee's Dev Diary Season 2 Finale
description:
It's the season finale of Yahtzee's Dev Diary Season 2 today. Dev Diary will be back, but is going on ice for the moment for the return of a fan-favorite column (now video essay series), Extra Punctuation. 

See you soon!
